name: Orichalcum Logging Axe
description: Used to chop down all saplings.

bonuses: 25% chance when struck to summon a rock dog. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 90s)</c>
15% chance when struck to cause your next attack to steal life. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 25s)</c>
After using your healing skill, your next attack skill steals health. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 10s)</c>
When struck below 25% health, you steal health from nearby foes. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 40s)</c>
When striking your foe from behind or the side gain +10% damage.
+20% swiftness duration; when you use a heal skill, you and all nearby allies gain swiftness for 10 seconds. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 10s)</c>
25% chance when struck to remove a condition. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 30s)</c>
+15% Boon Duration; when you use a heal skill, you and nearby allies are healed for a small amount. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 10s)</c>
+2% damage against foes with less than 50% health.
+4% damage against foes with less than 50% health.
+6% damage against targets with less than 50% health.
When struck below 20% health, cloak for 4 seconds. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 60s)</c>
25% chance when struck to gain protection for 3 seconds. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 30s)</c>
+20% protection duration; when struck below 20% health you gain a magnetic aura for 5 seconds. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 90s)</c>
25% chance when struck to cause an ice nova. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 30s)</c>
+20% chill duration; +7% damage against chilled foes.
50% chance when struck to cause fear for 1 second. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 60s)</c>
25% chance when struck to gain might for 10s. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 5s)</c>
+20% burning duration; when struck below 80% health you gain a fire aura for 5s. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 60s)</c>
25% chance when struck to gain fury for 15s. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 30s)</c>
20% fury duration; 50% chance when struck to summon a bomb. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 15s)</c>
25% chance to cause burning for 1s when hit. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 10s)</c>
+20% burning duration; +7% damage against burning foes.
25% chance when struck to grant nearby allies might, fury, and swiftness for 10s . <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 20s)</c>
+15% bleeding duration; 25% chance when struck to cause bleeding for 10 seconds. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 15s)</c>
+20% bleeding duration; when you use your elite skill you inflict bleeding, torment, and poison for 8 seconds to nearby foes. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 30s)</c>
+10% boon duration; 25% chance when struck to heal for a small amount. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 15s)</c>
When you block a foe's attack, burn that foe for 1 second.
Shouts remove a condition from each affected ally.
When struck below 50% health you gain protection for 10s and burn nearby foes. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 60s)</c>
25% chance to gain vigor for 5 seconds when struck. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 25s)</c>
+20% burning duration; 50% chance when struck to cause a fire nova. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 30s)</c>
15% chance when struck to summon a bird to strike the attacking foe. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 10s)</c>
When the summoned bird strikes a foe, it also inflicts blindness for 5 seconds.
When you use a heal skill, you and nearby allies are healed for a small amount. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 10s)</c>
7% of vitality is converted to ferocity.
+20% poison duration; 50% chance when struck to summon a radiation field. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 90s)</c>
While wielding a conjured weapon, environmental weapons, kits, banners, and stolen items gain +7% damage.
25% chance when struck to gain swiftness for 15 seconds. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 30s)</c>
When you use a heal skill you gain 50% endurance. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 10s)</c>
+7% damage while you have an active companion.
When you use a heal skill you gain 3 stacks of might for 10 seconds. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 10s)</c>
25% chance when struck to gain retaliation for 4 seconds.<c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 30s)</c>
When struck below 20% health gain stability for 5 seconds. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 60s)</c>
25% chance when struck to gain fury for 15 seconds. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 30s)</c>
+20% fury duration; while under the effects of fury gain +5% damage.
50% chance when struck to summon a jagged horror. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 60s)</c>
When you use a heal skill you gain a random boon for 10 seconds. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 10s)</c>
When you use an elite skill, convert up to 5 conditions into boons. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 45s)</c>
25% chance when struck to gain protection for 4 seconds. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 30s)</c>
+20% protection duration; 50% chance when struck to root the attacking foe. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 90s)</c>
+20% chill duration; when you're struck below 20% health, gain Frost Aura for 5 seconds. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 90s)</c>
-10% Incoming Condition Duration; -10% Incoming Stun Duration
-15% Incoming Condition Duration; -15% Incoming Stun Duration
Gain up to 400 toughness while reviving an ally, based on your level.
You resurrect allies with 30% more health.
7% of toughness is converted to condition damage.

(Cooldown: 10 Seconds)

name: Omega Siege Golem Blueprints
description: Use to construct an omega siege golem build site. It is faster and more powerful than the alpha siege golem. Range 1500. Requires 150 supply to complete.

name: Copper Tournament Reward Chest
description: Double-click to receive your PvP rewards.

name: Gold Free Tournament Reward Chest
description: Double-click to receive your PvP rewards.

name: Ert's Unguent
description:
Double-click to gain a hero point.
The stench of this is almost unbearable. One gulp and you'll understand why Ert is so green and angry all the time.

name: Cuatl Tonic
description:
Double-click to gain a hero point.
There's a faint whiff of flies and swamp water. Drink enough of this and you'll turn red, too.

name: Phoenix Reward Chest
description: Double-click to receive your PvP rewards.

name: Deer Reward Chest
description: Double-click to receive your PvP rewards.

name: Grandmaster's Training Manual
description: Double-click to use. This item will unlock the ability to spend up to 30 points in all trait lines, and will refund your currently spent trait points. This item can only be used once.

name: Commander's Compendium
description: Double-click to use. Unlock the ability to become a Commander.

name: Skritt Stew
description:
Double-click to gain a hero point.
It's unclear what's in this concoction, but just smelling it makes your nose twitch like a rodent's.

name: Morgan's Orchid
description:
Double-click to gain a hero point.
Morganas orchidae. This rare blossom is as beautiful as it is hardy. No one knows what gives it such resilience.

name: Raven Tonic
description:
Double-click to gain a hero point.
A spiced, smoky concoction. Raven shamans make this, but nobody knows where or how.

name: Master's Training Manual
description: Double-click to use. This item will unlock the ability to spend up to 20 points in all trait lines, and will refund your currently spent trait points. This item can only be used once.

name: Draithor's Lab's Powerfully Weird Meat
description:
Double-click to gain a hero point.
This...food has an unfamiliar but tempting aroma. Probably best to eat it first and not ask questions.

name: Centaur Feed
description:
Double-click to gain a hero point.
This is the feed from the local centaur tribe. It's mostly berries and grass, but you can smell some mystery ingredient... Must be good.

name: Adept's Training Manual
description: Double-click to use. This item will unlock the ability to spend up to 10 points in all trait lines, and will refund your currently spent trait points. This item can only be used once.

name: Grawl Paint
description:
Double-click to gain a hero point.
This clay is obviously magical. No wonder the grawl spread it all over the place. You should be able to imbue yourself with its essence.

name: Tasty Meat
description:
Double-click to gain a hero point.
The finest cut of meat at Meatoberfest. The smell of its flame-roasted goodness makes it impossible to resist.

name: Mini-moa Egg
description: Double-click to use. Hatch out a Mini-moa to dance for you.

name: Unidentified Beverage
description:
Double-click to gain a hero point.
A bottle of liquid found near a fallen explorer in Orr. The origin of the beverage is unknown.

name: Toxal Bog Stew
description:
Double-click to gain a hero point.
Brewed from mystery ingredients found in the Toxal Bog—equal parts hearty meal and bug repellent.

name: Sunken Rations
description:
Double-click to gain a hero point.
These drowned rations are sodden with seawater.

name: Spider Egg
description:
Double-click to gain a hero point.
The spiders here grow very large. It stands to reason that their eggs must make you stronger...

name: Bottle of Skrittsburgh Special
description:
Double-click to gain a hero point.
A thick, hearty beverage favored in Skrittsburgh. It seems to contain some kind of grain along with trace tufts of fur.

name: Cold Filtered Wurm Tincture
description:
Double-click to gain a hero point.
Made high in the Shiverpeak Mountains using a secret wurm-bladder filtration process...it's not for everyone.

name: Prototype Ooze Concentrate Tincture
description:
Double-click to gain a hero point.
There's a faint whiff of something strange and powerfully concentrated. Drink this at your own risk.

name: Mysterious Meat
description:
Double-click to gain a hero point.
This strange fermented meat smells exotic. Maybe it's best not to think about where it came from.

name: Iron Harvesting Sickle
description: Used to gather Taproots, Spinach, Strawberries, Herb Sprouts, and all other lesser edible plants. Can also crack open Clams.

name: Iron Logging Axe
description: Used to chop down Gummo Saplings, Mimosa Saplings, Snow Cherry Saplings, and all other lesser saplings.

name: Iron Mining Pick
description: Used to mine Iron Ore, Silver Ore, and all other lesser metals.
